column5: Merry Xmas to all and here’s to hopefully a “hassle free” 2022
Agreed hopefully 2022 will be a great year & I hope everyone had a great Christmas!

Merry Christmas....my wife got me a great tee shirt. I don't know how to post a picture but it says " I'm tired of waking up and not being in Canada" I love it. She said she was gonna get one made for her that says "I'm tired of waking up and him not being in Canada" God love her!
I think the LCBO store in Sioux Narrows has closed.
Just looked it up and the web site says permanetly closed.
Stopped in here at the LCBO in Vermilion Bay today.Thought I'd take a pic for some of you who maybe couldn't make it up this year.
I'm surprised that one is still open ! I heard alot of them have permanently closed ?
[QUOTE=Wallychowder;6619378]I'm surprised that one is still open ! I heard alot of them Can't imagine a booze store closing.lol.
[QUOTE=prov1800;6619388]That would make a great ice shack with all the contents left in it.drill about 20 holes and have a open bar for those who drink.
There's no shortage of booze hounds..myself included..to keep the LC's up and running in the NW Ontario region.
shoulda included a pic of their new DUTY RATES....
Merry Christmas to all and to all a good bite.
